keyMoments.title: Rob Lucci's True Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: The bull-masked agent removes his mask, revealing himself to be Rob Lucci, the quiet shipwright and foreman at Galley-La Company, shocking Iceburg who had trusted him for five years.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most shocking reveals in One Piece, exposing that a trusted ally was actually the leader of a dangerous government assassination squad.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Demands the Real Pluton Blueprints
keyMoments.description: After revealing their true identities, Lucci and the CP9 agents demand that Iceburg hand over the genuine Pluton blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the central conflict of the Water 7/Enies Lobby saga and clarifies CP9's mission.

relationships.description: Lucci's pigeon companion who sits on his shoulder.

evolutionMoments.description: Hattori is seen with Lucci when he removes his mask.

relationships.description: Lucci spent five years undercover as Iceburg's trusted foreman, only to reveal himself as a CP9 agent seeking the Pluton blueprints.

evolutionMoments.description: Lucci reveals his true identity to Iceburg, betraying five years of trust.

reveals.information: Revealed as CP9 leader and government assassin, not a simple shipwright
Five-year undercover mission to obtain Pluton blueprints from Iceburg

keyMoments.title: Kaku's True Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: The skull-masked agent removes his mask to reveal himself as Kaku, the energetic square-nosed shipwright who had inspected the Going Merry and befriended the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Another devastating betrayal as Kaku, who had seemed like a friendly ally to the Straw Hats, is revealed to be a CP9 agent.

keyMoments.title: Kaku Demonstrates Rankyaku
keyMoments.description: Kaku demonstrates the Rokushiki technique Rankyaku by kicking with tremendous speed and strength, creating a sharp compressed air blade.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Rankyaku, one of the Rokushiki techniques that becomes one of Kaku's signature moves.

abilities.description: A kicking-based Rokushiki technique that creates sharp compressed air blades.

relationships.description: Kaku spent five years undercover as one of Iceburg's trusted foremen at Galley-La Company.

evolutionMoments.description: Kaku reveals his true identity as a CP9 agent to Iceburg.

reveals.information: Revealed as CP9 member and government assassin, not a simple shipwright
Can use Rankyaku, a Rokushiki technique

keyMoments.title: Kalifa's True Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: The soldier-masked agent removes her mask to reveal herself as Kalifa, Iceburg's beautiful and efficient secretary.
keyMoments.significance: The revelation that even Iceburg's personal secretary was a CP9 spy demonstrates the thoroughness of the World Government's infiltration.

relationships.description: Kalifa spent five years undercover as Iceburg's trusted secretary, the position with the most access to him and his secrets.

evolutionMoments.description: Kalifa reveals her true identity as a CP9 agent to Iceburg.

reveals.information: Revealed as CP9 member and government assassin, not Iceburg's secretary

keyMoments.title: Blueno Demonstrates Tekkai
keyMoments.description: The bear-masked agent uses Tekkai to harden his body completely, blocking Tilestone's mallet attack effortlessly, then delivers a devastating punch.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the Rokushiki technique Tekkai in the anime, showcasing CP9's superhuman abilities.

keyMoments.title: Blueno Uses Soru
keyMoments.description: Blueno demonstrates the Rokushiki technique Soru, moving at incredible speed that appears almost like teleportation.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Soru, one of the six Rokushiki techniques that becomes a signature CP9 ability.

keyMoments.title: Blueno's True Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: The bear-masked agent removes his mask to reveal himself as Blueno, the quiet bartender from Blueno's Bar in Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: Completes the reveal of the four primary CP9 agents who had infiltrated Water 7 over five years.

abilities.description: A defensive Rokushiki technique that hardens the body like iron.
A speed-based Rokushiki technique that allows extremely rapid movement.

relationships.description: Blueno easily defeats Tilestone using Rokushiki techniques.

evolutionMoments.description: Blueno uses Tekkai to block Tilestone's attack and defeats him.

reveals.information: Revealed as CP9 member and government assassin, not a bartender
Can use Tekkai and Soru, Rokushiki techniques

keyMoments.title: Iceburg Confronts Robin About Poneglyphs
keyMoments.description: Iceburg confronts Nico Robin about her ability to read the ancient Poneglyphs and explains why the World Government considers her such a threat.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the connection between Robin's dangerous knowledge and the current Water 7 crisis.
keyMoments.quote: The World Government has made it illegal to continue research on the Poneglyphs. And they know that you can decipher them.

keyMoments.title: Iceburg Reveals He Has Pluton Blueprints
keyMoments.description: Iceburg shockingly reveals to Robin that he possesses the blueprints for Pluton, one of the three Ancient Weapons.
keyMoments.significance: A major world-building reveal that explains why CP9 has targeted Iceburg and connects the assassination attempts to the World Government's search for the legendary warship.
keyMoments.quote: I have the blueprints for the ancient weapon known as Pluton.

keyMoments.title: Iceburg's Shock at the Betrayal
keyMoments.description: Iceburg is devastated as he sees four of his most trusted colleagues revealed as government assassins after five years of working together.
keyMoments.significance: Captures the emotional weight of the CP9 reveal and the profound betrayal Iceburg experiences.

relationships.description: Iceburg confronts Robin about the Poneglyphs and reveals the Pluton blueprints to her.

evolutionMoments.description: Iceburg explains to Robin why she has been hunted since childhood.

relationships.description: Iceburg trusted Lucci as one of his best foremen for five years before learning he was a CP9 agent.

evolutionMoments.description: Lucci reveals his true identity as a CP9 agent, betraying five years of Iceburg's trust.

reveals.information: Possesses the blueprints for the ancient weapon Pluton
Knows about the illegality of Poneglyph research and Robin's ability to read them
